function.name: read_variable
function.description: Read an OPC UA variable by its NodeId and print its current value.

parameter.description: A descriptive name for the variable (for logging purposes).

nodeid.description: The OPC UA NodeId string identifying the variable (e.g., 'ns=4;i=11').

server_url.description: The server url you need to connect to.

function.name: write_variable
function.description: Write a fixed value to a specific OPC UA variable.

parameter.description: A descriptive name for the variable (for logging purposes).

nodeid.description: The OPC UA NodeId string identifying the variable (e.g., 'ns=4;i=11').

datatype.description: The name of the OPC UA VariantType (e.g., 'Float', 'Int16', 'String').

value.description: The value to set for the specified variable.

server_url.description: The server url you need to connect to.

function.name: adjust_variable
function.description: Adjust an OPC UA variable by a specified amount, either absolute or percentage.

parameter.description: A descriptive name for the variable (for logging purposes).

nodeid.description: The OPC UA NodeId string identifying the variable (e.g., 'ns=4;i=11').

datatype.description: The name of the OPC UA VariantType (e.g., 'Float', 'Int16', 'String').

delta.description: The amount to change the variable by. Take as stated in datatype (Float = 10.0; Int16 = 10).

server_url.description: The server url you need to connect to.

unit.description: The unit of adjustment. If 'percent', the delta is applied as a percentage of the current value; otherwise, it is applied as an absolute change.
